general.q: What is the BuffBets affiliate program?
general.a: This is a program that allows you to earn money by referring new players to our platform.

general.q: How does the BuffBets affiliate program work?
general.a: You place affiliate links, users register through them, and you receive a percentage of the generated profit.

general.q: How do I become a BuffBets affiliate partner?
general.a: Register on our website, complete your profile, and contact a manager to activate your account.

general.q: Is participation in the affiliate program free?
general.a: Yes, participation is completely free. We do not charge any fees to join.

general.q: In which GEOs can traffic be attracted?
general.a: We operate with a wide range of GEOs. Please check the current list with your personal manager.

general.q: What is an affiliate link and how to get it?
general.a: It is a unique link that assigns the player to you. It becomes available in your personal account after registration.

general.q: Can I promote BuffBets on multiple platforms?
general.a: Yes, you can create separate traffic flows for each platform to track performance.

income.a: Payouts are made weekly or monthly, depending on the terms of your tariff plan.

income.q: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
income.a: The minimum withdrawal amount is 50 USDT.
We work with CPA, RevShare, and Hybrid models. Please discuss the terms with your manager.

modal.title: BECOME A PARTNER
modal.desc: Fill out the form and our manager will contact you shortly.
modal.success_desc: Thank you! We've already started processing it.
